title: Another useless PBE question
body:
Hey! 
So I've seen a lot of people complaining about not being accepted for PBE because they're not "high elo" enough and I just wanted to ask if Riot only really accepts high elo / veterans players and if I have my chance to get through the PBE-signup hell even as a low-elo Silver and only playing since 1-year.

Sorry for asking another useless question and sorry if I'm butchering English, I'm French and not a good speaker. :/ 
Thank you and have a nice day!

replies.body: There is never such a thing as a dumb question, or an over asked one. It's a number of things that go into being accepted! A few are how active you are and your behavior in game. Being friendly in game comes with several benefits!

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NEvZlXf5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-11T18:12:21.461+0000)
>
> There is never such a thing as a dumb question, or an over asked one. It's a number of things that go into being accepted! A few are how active you are and your behavior in game. Being friendly in game comes with several benefits!

Okay, that's awesome! ty for your answer o/
I think they look more at the player's attitude than their elo, means friendly players/people who didn't get reported too often will have a higher chance of being accepted

> [{quoted}](name=Admiral Anus,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NEvZlXf5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-09T14:42:59.178+0000)
>
> I think they look more at the player's attitude than their elo, means friendly players/people who didn't get reported too often will have a higher chance of being accepted

that's what i thought, thank you!
